channel.title: How do i make a model 2 handed?

item.title: How do i make a model 2 handed?
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

[quote=“laveerre, post:3, topic:280124”]Wayzey…
I’m not sure if that handle thing was a attempt of sarcasm or something, but ty for the tip…i was looking in weaponhandler.cfg = )[/quote]

No I was saying if you meant how to make a model 2handed as in in meta make it long enough to be 2 handed then that would be just retarded. I was pretty sure you didn’t mean that but it was there just in case you did.

I know How you hold it is in item.java and you put the Item ID under a certain list, it’s like what decides what class the item falls under eg: You put 1437 under helmet then it’s classed as a helmet.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a model 2 handed?

item.title: How do i make a model 2 handed?
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

This is to do with client not modelling so don’t post it here. If you’re actually asking how to make the handel longer then wow… just wow.

To make 2hd I know u edit item.java and change something in there, I cbf finding out exactly what but it’s labelled in there so you shold be able to find it easy.
